```{r}
library("readr")
data_wide_read <- read_csv2("test_selection_scheme_wide.csv")
```


```{r}
#| column: screen

# install.packages("DT")
library(DT)

datatable(
  data_wide_read,
  filter = "top",
  rownames = FALSE,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 25,
    dom = "ltipr",
    scrollX = TRUE
  )
)
```

Create decision tree


```{r}
#| eval: false

col_names <- names(data_wide_read)

cat("flowchart LR\n")

for (i in seq_along(col_names)) {
    cat(sprintf("%s_%s", i, gsub(" ", "_", col_names[i]) ), '{"', col_names[i], '"}\n', sep = "",
        append = TRUE)
}

cat(mmd_syntax, file = "output.mmd", append = TRUE)
```

```{mermaid}

graph LR

    nodv{#DV} -->|one| todv{DV<br>type}
    click nodv callback "How many dependent variables (DVs) are in your data?"
    todv -->|continuous| nocontiv{#IV}
    nocontiv -->|one| typeofcontiv{IV<br>type}
    typeofcontiv -->|continuous| test1["Pearson correlation or regression"]
    test1 --> test1np["Bootstrap correlation/regression, Spearman correlation"]
    typeofcontiv -->|categorical| noivcat{#cat}
    noivcat -->|two| indep{M}
    A@{ shape: brace-r, label: "Are participants measured repeatedly of in different groups" } --- indep
    indep -->|same| test3["Paired-samples T-test (Dependent T-test)"]
    indep -->|different| test4["Independent T-test or Pointbiserial correlation"]

    noivcat -->|more than two| dep
    nocontiv -->|two or more| test2

    todv -->|categorical| nocativ{#IV}

    nodv -->|two or more| test

    subgraph glm
        test1
        test2
        test3
        test4
    end
```
